## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-119">Numero di routing ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-120">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-121">nove cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-122">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-123">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-124">quattro cifre che iniziano con 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 o 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-125">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-126">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-127">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-128">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-129">Non formattato: nove cifre consecutive che iniziano con 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 o 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-130">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-131">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-132">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-133">Un criterio ha una probabilità media di rilevamento di questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-134">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-135">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ABA_Routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-136">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-137">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-155">Numero DNI (Argentina National Identity)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-157">Otto cifre con o senza punti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-158">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-159">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-160">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-161">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-162">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-163">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-164">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-165">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-166">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-167">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-168">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-169">L'espressione regolare Regex_argentina_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-170">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_argentina_national_id dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-182">Numero di conto corrente bancario Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-184">da sei a dieci cifre con o senza un numero di filiale dello stato della banca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-185">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-186">Il numero di account è da 6 a 10 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-187">Numero BSB australiano:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-188">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-189">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-190">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-191">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-192">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-193">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-194">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-195">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-196">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-197">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-198">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-198">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-199">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-200">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

```xml
        </Pattern>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-291">cinque cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-292">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-293">da una a due lettere facoltative (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-294">da quattro a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-296">nove cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-297">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-298">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-299">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-300">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-301">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-302">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-303">Non vengono trovate parole chiava da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-403">Numero di conto medico Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-405">10-11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-406">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-407">10-11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-408">La prima cifra è compresa nell'intervallo 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-408">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-409">Nove cifre è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-409">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-410">La decima cifra è la cifra del problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-410">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-411">L'undicesima cifra (facoltativa) è il numero singolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-411">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-412">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-413">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-414">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-415">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-416">La funzione Func_australian_medical_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-417">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-418">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-430">Numero di passaporto australiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-432">Una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-433">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-434">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-435">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-436">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-437">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-438">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-439">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-440">Viene trovata una Keyword_passport o Keyword_australia_passport_number parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-441">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-441">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-442">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-442">Keyword_passport</span></span>

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-474">Numero di file fiscale australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-476">da otto a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-477">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-478">da otto a nove cifre in genere presentate con spazi come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-479">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-480">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-481">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-482">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-483">da due a tre cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-484">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-485">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-486">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-487">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-488">La funzione Func_australian_tax_file_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-489">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number o da Keyword_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-490">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-502">Austria - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-504">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-505">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-506">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-507">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-508">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-509">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-510">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-511">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-512">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-639">Carta d'identità Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-640">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-641">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-642">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-643">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-644">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-645">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-646">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-647">Una combinazione di 24 caratteri di lettere, cifre e caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-648">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-649">24 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-650">22 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre o segni più</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-651">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre, segni più o segni di uguale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-652">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-653">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-654">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-655">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-656">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-657">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-663">Numero di passaporto austriano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-665">Una lettera seguita da uno spazio facoltativo e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-666">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-667">Combinazione di una lettera, sette cifre e uno spazio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-668">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-669">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-670">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-671">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-672">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-673">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-674">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-675">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-676">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-677">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-678">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-679">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-680">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-704">Austria - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-704">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-705">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-706">10 cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-706">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-707">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-708">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-708">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-709">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-709">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-710">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-710">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-711">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-711">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-712">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-712">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-713">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-713">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-714">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-714">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-715">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-715">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-716">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-717">viene trovata una  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` parola chiave da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-717">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-718">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-719">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-719">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-745">Numero di identificazione fiscale Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-745">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-746">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-746">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-747">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-747">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-748">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-748">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-749">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-749">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-750">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-750">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-751">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-751">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-752">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-752">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-753">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-753">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-754">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-754">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-755">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-756">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-756">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-757">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-758">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-758">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-759">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-760">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-760">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-761">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-761">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-762">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-762">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-786">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-786">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-787">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-787">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-790">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-790">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-791">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-791">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-793">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-793">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-794">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-794">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1098">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1099">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+), preceduta o seguita dai caratteri indicati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1099">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1106">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1107">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1107">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1108">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1108">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1109">Numero di patente di guida belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1109">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1110">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1110">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1111">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1111">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1112">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1112">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1113">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1113">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1114">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1115">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1116">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1117">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1117">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1118">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1118">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1119">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1119">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1252">Belgio - Numero nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1252">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1253">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1254">11 cifre più delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1254">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1255">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1256">11 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1256">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1257">sei cifre e due punti facoltativi nel formato AA. MM.DD per la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1257">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1258">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1258">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1259">tre cifre sequenziali (dispari per i maschi, anche per le femmine)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1259">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1260">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1260">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1261">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1261">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1262">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1263">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1263">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1264">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1265">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1266">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1266">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1267">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_belgium_national_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1267">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1268">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1269">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1269">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1270">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1270">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1271">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1271">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1330">Belgio - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1330">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1332">due lettere seguite da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1332">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1333">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1334">due lettere e seguito da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1334">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1335">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1336">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1336">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1337">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1337">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1338">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1339">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1339">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1340">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1340">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1341">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave da o viene `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1341">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1342">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1342">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1343">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1343">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1344">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1344">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1345">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1345">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1346">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1346">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1371">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto del Belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1371">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1372">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1373">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1374">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1375">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1376">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1377">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1379">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1379">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1380">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1381">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1381">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1382">una lettera B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1382">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1383">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1383">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1384">una cifra 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1384">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1385">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1385">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1386">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1386">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1387">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1387">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1388">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1388">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1389">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1389">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1390">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1391">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1391">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1392">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1393">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1394">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1394">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1395">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1395">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1396">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1396">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1397">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1397">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1409">Brasile - Numero CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1409">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1411">11 cifre che includono una cifra di controllo e possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1411">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1412">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1413">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1413">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1414">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1415">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1415">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1416">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1417">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1417">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1418">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1418">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1419">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1419">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1420">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1420">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1421">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1421">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1422">11 cifre dove le ultime due sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1422">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1423">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1424">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1424">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1425">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1426">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1427">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1427">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1428">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cpf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1428">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1429">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1429">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1430">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1430">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1431">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1431">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1432">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1432">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1444">Numero della persona giuridica del Brasile (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1444">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1445">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1445">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1446">14 cifre che includono il numero di registrazione, il codice della filiale, le cifre di controllo e i delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1446">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1447">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1447">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1448">14 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1448">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1449">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1449">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1450">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1450">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1451">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1451">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1452">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1452">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1453">tre cifre (queste prime otto cifre sono il numero di registrazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1453">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1454">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1454">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1455">Numero di ramo a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1455">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1456">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1456">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1457">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1457">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1458">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1459">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1459">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1460">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1461">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1462">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1462">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1463">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cnpj da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1463">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1464">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1464">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1465">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1466">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1466">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1467">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
