## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1489">Carta di identità nazionale (RG) del Brasile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1489">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1490">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1491">Registro Geral (formato precedente): nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1491">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1492">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato): 11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1492">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1493">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1493">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1494">Registro Geral (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1494">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1495">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1495">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1496">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1496">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1497">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1497">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1498">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1498">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1499">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1499">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1500">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1500">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1501">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1501">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1502">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1502">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1503">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1503">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1504">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1504">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1505">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1505">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1506">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1507">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1507">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1508">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1509">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1509">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1510">La funzione Func_brazil_rg trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1510">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1511">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_brazil_rg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1511">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1512">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1523">Numero di patente di guida bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1523">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1524">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1525">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1525">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1526">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1527">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1527">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1528">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1529">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1530">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1531">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1531">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1532">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1532">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1533">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1533">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1660">Numero civile uniforme Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1660">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1661">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1661">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1662">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1662">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1663">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1663">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1664">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1664">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1665">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1665">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1666">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1666">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1667">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1668">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1668">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1669">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1670">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1670">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1671">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1671">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1672">due cifre che corrispondono all'ordine di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1672">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1673">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso: una cifra pari per il maschio e una cifra dispari per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1673">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1674">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1674">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1675">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1676">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1676">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1677">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1678">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1678">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1679">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1679">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1680">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1680">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1681">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1681">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1682">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1682">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1727">Numero di passaporto bulgaro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1727">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1728">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1728">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1729">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1729">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1730">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1730">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1731">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1731">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1732">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1732">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1733">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1733">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1734">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1734">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1735">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1735">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1736">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1736">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1737">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1737">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1738">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1738">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1739">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1739">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1740">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1740">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1741">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1761">Canada - Numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1761">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1763">7 o 12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1763">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1764">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1765">Un numero di conto corrente bancario canadese è di 7 o 12 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1765">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1766">Un numero di transito bancario canadese comprende:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1766">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1767">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1767">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1768">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1768">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1769">tre cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1769">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1770">zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1770">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1771">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1771">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1772">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1773">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1773">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1774">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1775">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1775">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1776">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1776">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1777">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1777">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1778">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1778">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1779">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1779">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1780">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1780">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1781">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1781">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1805">Canada - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1805">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1807">Varia in base alla provincia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1807">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1808">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1809">Vari modelli per Alberta, Columbia Britannica, Manitoba, Nuovo Brunswick, Terranova e Labrador, Nuova Scozia, Ontario, Isola del Principe Edoardo, Quebec e Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1809">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1810">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1810">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1812">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1813">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1814">La funzione Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1814">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1815">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1815">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1816">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1816">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1952">Numero del servizio sanitario canadese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1952">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1953">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1954">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1954">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1955">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1956">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1956">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1957">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1958">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1959">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1960">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1961">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_health_service_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1961">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1962">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_health_service_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1962">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1975">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1976">due lettere maiuscole seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1976">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1979">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1979">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1981">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1982">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1983">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1983">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-1984">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_canada_passport_number o Keyword_passport viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-1984">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2014">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2014">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2016">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2016">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2017">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2018">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2018">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2019">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2020">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2021">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2022">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2022">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2023">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_phin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2023">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2024">Vengono trovate almeno due parole Keyword_canada_phin o Keyword_canada_provinces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2024">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2057">Canada - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2057">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2058">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2059">nove cifre con trattini o spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2059">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2060">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2061">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2061">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2062">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2062">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2063">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2063">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2064">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2064">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2065">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2065">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2066">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2066">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2067">Non formattato: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2067">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2068">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2069">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2069">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2070">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2071">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2072">La funzione Func_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2072">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2073">Almeno due delle seguenti combinazioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2073">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2074">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2075">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2075">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2076">La funzione Func_eu_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2076">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2077">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2077">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2078">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2078">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2079">La funzione Func_unformatted_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2079">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2080">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2080">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2081">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2081">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2106">Numero di carta di identità cileno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2106">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2108">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori una cifra di controllo o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2108">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2109">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2110">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2110">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2111">da una a due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2111">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2112">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2112">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2113">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2113">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2114">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2114">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2115">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2115">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2116">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2116">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2117">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2117">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2118">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2119">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2120">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2121">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2122">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2122">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2123">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_chile_id_card parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2123">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2124">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2125">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2126">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2126">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2127">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2127">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2164">Numero di carta d'identità (PRC) residente in Cina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2164">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2165">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2166">18 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2166">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2167">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2167">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2168">18 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2168">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2169">sei cifre che sono un codice indirizzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2169">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2170">otto cifre nel formato AAAAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2170">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2171">tre cifre che sono un codice d'ordine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2171">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2172">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2172">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2173">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2174">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2174">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2175">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2176">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2176">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2177">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2177">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2178">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_china_resident_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2178">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2179">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2179">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2180">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2180">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2181">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2181">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2182">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2182">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2183">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2183">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2190">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2190">居民身份证</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2195">Numero carta di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2195">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2197">Da 14 a 16 cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate (dddddddd) e che devono superare il test Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2197">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2198">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2199">Modello complesso e affidabile che rileva le carte di tutte le principali marche in tutto il mondo, tra cui Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, carte regalo e carte da pranzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2199">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2200">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2201">Yes, il checksum Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2201">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2202">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2203">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2204">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2204">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2205">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2205">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2206">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2206">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2207">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2207">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2208">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2208">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2209">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2210">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2210">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2211">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2212">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2472">Croatia driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2472">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2474">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2474">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2475">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2476">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2476">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2477">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2477">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2478">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2478">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2479">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2479">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2480">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2481">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2481">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2482">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2482">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2606">Numero di carta d'identità della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2606">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2607">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2607">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2608">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2608">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2609">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2610">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2610">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2611">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2612">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2612">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2613">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2614">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2615">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2616">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2616">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2617">La funzione Func_croatia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2617">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2618">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_croatia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2618">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2651">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2651">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2652">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2653">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2653">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2654">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2654">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2655">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2655">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2656">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2656">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2657">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2657">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2658">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2658">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2659">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2659">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2660">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2660">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2661">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2662">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2662">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2663">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2663">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2681">Numero di identificazione personale (OIB) della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2681">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2683">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2684">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2685">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2685">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2686">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2686">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2687">la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2687">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2688">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2689">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2690">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2691">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2691">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2692">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2692">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2693">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2693">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2694">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2695">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2696">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2697">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2728">Numero di licenza per i driver di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2728">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2729">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2729">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2730">12 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2730">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2731">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2731">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2732">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2732">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2733">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2734">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2734">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2735">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2736">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2737">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2737">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2738">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2738">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2863">Carta d'identità di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2863">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2864">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2864">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2865">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2865">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2866">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2866">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2867">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2867">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2868">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2868">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2869">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2869">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2870">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2871">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2871">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2872">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2873">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2873">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2874">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2875">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2875">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2876">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2877">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2878">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2878">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2879">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2879">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2888">Numero di passaporto di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2888">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2889">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2890">una lettera seguita da 6-8 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2890">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2891">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2892">una lettera seguita da sei a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2892">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2893">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2893">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2894">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2894">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2895">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2895">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2896">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2896">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2897">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2897">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2898">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2898">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2899">L'espressione `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG/MM/AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2899">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2900">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2901">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2901">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2902">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2902">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
