## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2931">Codice fiscale di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2931">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2932">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2932">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2933">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2933">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2934">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2934">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2935">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2935">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2936">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2936">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2937">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2937">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2939">otto cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2939">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2940">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2941">otto cifre e una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2941">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2942">a "0" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2942">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2943">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2943">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2944">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2944">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2945">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2946">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2946">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2947">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2948">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2948">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2949">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2949">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2950">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2950">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2951">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2952">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2952">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2980">Numero di patente di guida ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2980">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2981">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2982">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2982">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2983">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2984">otto lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2984">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2985">lettera "E" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2985">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2986">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2986">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2987">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2987">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2988">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2988">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2989">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2989">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2990">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2990">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2991">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2991">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2992">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2992">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2993">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2993">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-2994">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-2994">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3120">Numero di passaporto ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3120">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3121">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3122">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3122">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3123">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3124">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3124">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3125">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3126">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3126">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3127">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3128">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3128">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3129">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3129">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3130">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3130">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3131">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3131">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3132">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3132">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3133">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3133">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3134">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3134">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3157">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3158">nove cifre con barra facoltativa (formato precedente) 10 cifre con barra facoltativa (nuovo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3158">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3159">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3160">nove cifre (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3160">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3161">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3161">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3162">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3162">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3163">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3163">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3164">10 cifre (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3164">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3165">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3165">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3166">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3166">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3167">quattro cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3167">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3168">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3169">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3169">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3170">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3171">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3172">La funzione Func_czech_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3172">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3173">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_czech_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3173">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3174">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3174">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3175">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3176">La funzione Func_czech_id_card_new_format trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3176">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3177">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3224">Numero di patente di guida danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3224">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3225">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3225">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3226">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3226">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3227">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3227">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3228">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3228">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3229">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3230">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3230">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3231">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3232">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3232">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3233">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3233">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3234">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3234">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3358">Numero di passaporto danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3358">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3359">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3360">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3360">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3361">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3362">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3362">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3363">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3364">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3364">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3365">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3366">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3366">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3367">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3367">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3368">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3368">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3369">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3369">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3370">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3370">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3371">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3371">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3372">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3372">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3392">Numero di identificazione personale Danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3392">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3394">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3394">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3395">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3396">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3396">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3397">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3397">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3398">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3398">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3399">quattro cifre in cui la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3399">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3400">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3401">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3402">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3403">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3404">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3404">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3405">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_denmark_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3405">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3406">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3406">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3407">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3407">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3408">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3408">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3409">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3409">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3481">Numero dea (Drug Enforcement Agency)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3481">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3482">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3483">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3483">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3484">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3485">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3485">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3486">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) da questo set di lettere possibili: abcdefghjklmnprstux, che è un codice registrante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3486">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3487">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), ovvero la prima lettera del cognome o della cifra "9" del dichiarante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3487">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3488">sette cifre, l'ultima delle quali è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3488">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3489">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3490">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3490">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3491">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3492">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3492">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3493">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3493">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3494">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_dea_number` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3494">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3495">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3495">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3496">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3496">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3497">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3497">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3498">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3498">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3505">Numero di patente di guida estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3505">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3507">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3507">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3508">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3509">due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3509">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3510">le lettere "ET" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3510">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3511">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3511">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3512">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3513">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3513">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3514">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3515">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3515">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3516">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3516">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3517">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3517">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3643">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3643">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3644">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3644">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3645">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3645">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3646">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3646">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3647">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3647">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3648">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3648">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3649">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3649">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3651">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3651">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3652">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3653">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3653">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3654">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita (numero dispari maschile, numero pari femminile; 1-2: 19° secolo; 3-4: 20° secolo; 5-6: 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3654">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3655">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3655">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3656">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale che separa le persone nate nella stessa data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3656">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3657">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3657">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3658">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3659">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3659">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3660">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3661">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3661">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3662">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3662">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3663">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3663">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3664">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3664">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3665">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3665">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3698">Numero di passaporto estone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3698">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3699">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3699">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3700">una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3700">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3701">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3701">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3702">una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3702">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3704">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3704">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3705">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3706">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3707">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3707">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3708">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3709">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3709">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3710">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3710">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3711">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3711">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3712">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3712">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3730">Numero carta di debito UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3730">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3732">16 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3732">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3733">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3734">Modello complesso e affidabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3734">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3735">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3736">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3736">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3737">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3738">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3738">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3739">La funzione Func_eu_debit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3739">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3740">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3740">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3741">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_eu_debit_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3741">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3742">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3742">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3743">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_security_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3743">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3744">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3744">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3745">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3745">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-3746">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-3746">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4193">Numero di patente di guida finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4193">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4194">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4195">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4195">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4196">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4197">10 cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4197">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4198">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4198">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4199">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4199">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4200">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4200">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4201">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4201">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4202">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4202">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4203">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4203">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4204">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4204">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4205">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4205">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4206">L'espressione  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4206">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4207">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4207">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4338">Finlandia - Numero di assicurazione sanitaria europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4338">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4339">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4339">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4340">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4340">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4341">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4341">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4342">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4342">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4343">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4343">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4344">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4344">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4345">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4346">Numero a 20 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4346">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4347">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4348">Numero a 20 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4348">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4349">10 cifre - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4349">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4350">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4350">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4351">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4351">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4352">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4353">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4354">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4355">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4356">L'espressione Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4356">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4357">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4357">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4375">Id nazionale Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4375">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4377">sei cifre più un carattere che indica un secolo più tre cifre più una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4377">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4378">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4379">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4379">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4380">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, che sono una data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4380">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4381">indicatore del secolo ('-', '+' o 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4381">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4382">Numero di identificazione personale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4382">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4383">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4383">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4384">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4385">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4385">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4386">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4387">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4387">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4388">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4388">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4389">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_finnish_national_id viene trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4389">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4390">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4390">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4391">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4391">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4392">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4392">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4393">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4393">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4442">Numero di passaporto finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4442">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4443">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4443">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4444">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4445">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4445">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4446">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4446">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4447">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4447">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4448">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4449">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4449">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4450">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4451">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4452">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4453">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4453">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4454">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4454">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4455">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4455">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4456">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4456">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4457">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4457">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4458">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4458">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4459">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4459">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4483">Francia - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4483">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4484">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4484">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4486">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4486">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4487">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4488">12 cifre con convalida per scontare modelli analoghi, ad esempio, quello dei numeri telefonici francesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4488">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4489">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4490">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4490">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4491">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4492">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4492">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4493">la funzione Func_french_drivers_license trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4493">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4494">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_french_drivers_license ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4494">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4622">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4622">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4623">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4623">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4624">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4624">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4625">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4625">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4626">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4626">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4627">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4627">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4628">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4629">Numero a 21 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4629">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4630">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4630">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4631">Numero a 21 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4631">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4632">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4632">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4633">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4633">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4634">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4634">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4635">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4635">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4636">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4636">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4637">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4638">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4639">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4640">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4640">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4641">l'espressione Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4641">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4642">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4642">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4648">Carta d'identità francese (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4648">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4649">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4650">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4650">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4651">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4652">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4652">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4653">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4654">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4655">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4656">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4656">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4657">L'espressione regolare Regex_france_cni restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4657">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4658">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4658">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
