## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4672">Francia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4672">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4673">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4673">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4674">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4674">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4675">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4675">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4676">nove cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4676">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4677">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4677">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4678">nove cifre e lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4678">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4679">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4679">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4680">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4680">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4681">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4681">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4682">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4683">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4684">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4685">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4686">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4686">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4687">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4687">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4688">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4688">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4689">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4690">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4690">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4691">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4691">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4722">Numero di previdenza sociale francia (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4722">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4723">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4724">15 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4724">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4725">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4726">Deve corrispondere a uno di questi due modelli:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4726">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4727">13 cifre seguite da uno spazio seguito da due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4727">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4728">oppure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4728">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4729">15 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4729">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4730">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4731">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4732">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4733">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4734">La funzione `Func_french_insee` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4734">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4735">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4735">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4736">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4737">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4737">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4738">La funzione Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4738">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4739">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4770">Numero di identificazione fiscale francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4770">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4771">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4772">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4772">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4773">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4774">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4774">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4775">Una cifra che deve essere 0, 1, 2 o 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4775">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4776">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4776">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4777">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4777">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4778">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4778">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4787">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4788">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4789">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4789">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4790">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4790">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4791">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4792">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4792">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4834">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4835">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4835">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4838">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4839">La funzione Func_france_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4839">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4863">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4863">a digit or letter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-4867">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-4867">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5019">Numero carta d'identità Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5019">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5020">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5021">dal 1° novembre 2010: nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5021">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5022">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010: 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5022">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5023">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5024">dal 1° novembre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5024">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5025">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5025">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5026">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5026">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5027">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5027">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5028">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5028">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5029">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5029">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5030">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5030">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5031">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5031">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5032">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5032">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5033">L'espressione regolare Regex_germany_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5033">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5034">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_germany_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5034">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5050">Germania - Numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5050">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5051">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate numero di passaporto UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5051">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5053">10 cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5053">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5054">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5055">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5055">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5056">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5056">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5057">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5057">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5058">cinque cifre o lettere di questo set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5058">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5059">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5059">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5060">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5061">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5062">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5063">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5064">La funzione Func_german_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5064">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5065">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5065">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5066">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5067">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5068">La funzione Func_german_passport_data restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5068">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5069">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5069">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5070">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5070">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5093">Numero di identificazione fiscale Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5093">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5094">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5094">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5095">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5095">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5096">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5096">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5097">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5097">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5098">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5098">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5099">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5099">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5100">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5100">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5101">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5101">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5102">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5102">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5103">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5103">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5104">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5104">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5105">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5105">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5106">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5107">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5107">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5108">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5109">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5110">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5110">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5111">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5111">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5112">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5113">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5113">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5139">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto della Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5139">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5140">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5140">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5141">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5141">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5142">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5142">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5143">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5143">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5144">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5144">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5145">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5145">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5146">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5147">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5147">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5148">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5149">Motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5149">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5150">una lettera D o d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5150">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5151">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5151">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5152">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5153">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5153">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5154">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5154">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5155">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5155">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5156">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5156">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5157">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5157">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5158">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5159">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5160">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5161">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5162">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5162">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5163">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5163">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5164">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5165">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5165">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5175">Numero di patente di guida in Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5175">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5176">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5176">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5178">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5178">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5179">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5180">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5180">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5181">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5182">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5183">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5184">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5185">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5185">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5186">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5312">Carta d'identità nazionale della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5312">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5313">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5314">Combinazione di 7-8 lettere e numeri, oltre a un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5314">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5315">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5316">Sette lettere e numeri (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5316">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5317">Una lettera (qualsiasi lettera dell'alfabeto greco) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5317">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5318">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5318">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5319">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5319">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5320">Otto lettere e numeri (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5320">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5321">Due lettere in maiuscolo sia in alfabeto latino che greco (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5321">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5322">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5322">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5323">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5323">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5324">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5324">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5325">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5325">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5326">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5326">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5327">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5327">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5328">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5328">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5329">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_greece_id_card'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5329">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5330">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5330">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5331">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5331">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5333">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5333">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5336">carta d'identità greco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5336">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5337">id polizia greco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5337">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5338">carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5338">identity card</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5342">Numero di passaporto della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5342">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5344">Due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5344">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5345">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5346">Due lettere seguite da 7 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5346">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5347">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5348">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5348">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5349">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5350">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5350">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5351">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5351">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5352">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5352">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5353">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM AA (esempio - 28 agosto 19) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5353">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5354">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5354">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5355">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5355">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5356">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5356">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5373">Grecia - Numero di previdenza sociale (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5373">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5374">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5374">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5375">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5375">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5376">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5376">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5377">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5377">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5378">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5378">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5379">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5379">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5380">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5380">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5382">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5382">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5383">6 cifre come data di nascita AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5383">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5385">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5385">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5386">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5387">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5388">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5389">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5389">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5390">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5390">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5391">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5391">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5392">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5392">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5393">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5393">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5449">Numero della carta di identità (HKID) di Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5449">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5450">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5450">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5451">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere e numeri. Facoltativamente, l’ultimo carattere può essere racchiuso tra parentesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5451">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5452">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5452">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5453">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5453">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5454">1-2 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5454">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5455">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5455">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5456">L'ultimo carattere (qualsiasi cifra o la lettera A), è rappresentato dal numero di controllo. Facoltativamente, può essere racchiuso tra parentesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5456">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5457">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5458">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5459">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5460">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5460">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5461">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5461">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5462">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_hong_kong_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5462">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5463">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5463">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5464">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5464">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5465">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5465">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5466">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5466">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5506">Numero di patente di guida ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5506">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5507">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5507">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5508">Due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5508">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5509">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5509">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5510">Due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5510">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5511">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5511">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5512">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5512">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5513">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5513">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5514">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5514">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5515">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5515">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5516">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5516">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5517">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5517">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5518">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5518">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5643">Numero di identificazione personale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5643">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5644">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5644">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5645">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5645">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5646">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5646">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5647">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5647">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5648">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5648">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5649">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5649">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5651">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5651">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5652">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5653">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5653">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5654">Una cifra che corrisponde al sesso (1-maschile, 2-femminile, altri numeri sono possibili anche per i cittadini nati prima del 1900 o i cittadini con doppia cittadinanza)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5654">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5655">Sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5655">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5656">Tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5656">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5657">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5657">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5658">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5659">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5659">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5660">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5661">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5661">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5662">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5662">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5663">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5663">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5664">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5664">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5665">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5665">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5676">Numero di passaporto ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5676">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5677">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5678">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5678">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5679">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5680">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5680">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5681">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5681">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5682">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5682">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5683">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5683">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5684">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5684">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5685">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5685">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5686">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5687">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5687">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5688">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5689">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5689">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5690">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5690">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5710">Codice di previdenza sociale ungherese (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5710">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5711">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5711">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5712">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5712">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5713">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5714">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5714">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5715">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5716">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5716">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5717">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5718">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5719">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5719">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5720">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5720">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5721">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5722">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5722">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5742">Numero di identificazione fiscale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5742">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5743">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5743">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5744">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5744">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5745">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5745">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5746">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5746">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5747">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5747">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5748">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5748">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5749">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5750">10 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5750">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5751">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5751">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5752">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5752">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5753">Una cifra che deve essere "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5753">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5754">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5754">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5755">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5755">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5756">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5757">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5757">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5758">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5759">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5759">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5760">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5760">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5761">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5761">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5762">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5763">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5763">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
