## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5789">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Ungheria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5789">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5790">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5790">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5791">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5791">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5792">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5792">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5793">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5793">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5794">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5794">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5795">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5795">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5796">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5797">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5797">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5798">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5799">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5799">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5800">due lettere - HU o hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5800">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5801">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5801">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5802">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5802">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5803">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5804">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5805">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5806">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5807">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5807">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5808">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5808">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5809">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5810">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5810">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5824">India - Numero di account permanente (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5824">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5826">10 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5826">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5827">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5828">10 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5828">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5829">Tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5829">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5830">Lettera in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5830">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5831">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5831">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5832">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5832">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5833">Una lettera che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5833">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5834">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5835">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5835">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5836">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5837">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5837">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5838">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5838">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5839">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_permanent_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5839">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5840">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5840">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5841">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5841">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5843">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5843">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5846">India - Numero di identificazione univoca (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5846">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5848">12 cifre contenenti spazi o trattini facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5848">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5849">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5850">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5850">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5851">Una cifra che non è 0 o 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5851">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5852">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5852">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5853">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5853">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5854">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5854">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5855">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5855">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5856">La cifra finale, che è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5856">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5857">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5857">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5858">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5858">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5859">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5859">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5860">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5860">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5861">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5861">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5862">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_aadhar da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5862">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5863">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5863">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5864">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5864">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5865">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5865">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5866">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5866">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5875">Numero della carta di identità indonesiana (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5875">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5877">16 cifre contenenti punti facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5877">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5878">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5879">16 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5879">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5880">Codice provincia a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5880">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5881">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5881">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5882">Codice città o area a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5882">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5883">Codice sotto-distretto a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5883">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5884">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5884">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5885">Sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5885">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5886">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5886">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5887">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5887">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5888">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5888">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5889">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5889">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5890">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5890">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5891">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5891">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5892">L'espressione regolare Regex_indonesia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5892">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5893">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_indonesia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5893">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5899">Numero di conto bancario internazionale (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5899">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5900">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5901">Codice paese (due lettere) più cifre di controllo (due cifre) più numero bban (fino a 30 caratteri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5901">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5902">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5903">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5903">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5904">Codice paese a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5904">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5905">Due cifre di controllo (seguite da uno spazio facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5905">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5906">1-7 gruppi di quattro lettere o cifre (possono essere separati da spazi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5906">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5907">1-3 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5907">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5908">Il formato per ogni paese è leggermente diverso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5908">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5909">Il tipo di informazioni riservate IBAN riguarda questi 60 paesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5909">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5910">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5910">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5911">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5912">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5912">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5913">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5914">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5914">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5915">La funzione Func_iban restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5915">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5916">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5916">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5920">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5925">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5926">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5927">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5928">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_updated parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5928">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5929">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_codes da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5929">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5930">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5930">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5931">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_ viene aggiornata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5931">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5932">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5932">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5933">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_10_updated parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, decima revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-10-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5933">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5934">Questo tipo cerca solo il termine e non i codici di assicurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5934">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5935">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_10_codes parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, decima revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-10-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5935">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5936">Questo tipo cerca solo i codici di assicurazione, non la descrizione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5936">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5955">Indirizzo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5955">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5956">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5956">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5957">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5957">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5958">Modello complesso che rappresenta le versioni formattate (punti) e non formattate (senza punti) degli indirizzi IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5958">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5959">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5959">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5960">Modello complesso che rappresenta i numeri IPv6 formattati (che includono i due punti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5960">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5961">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5961">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5962">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5963">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5963">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5964">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5965">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5965">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5966">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5966">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5967">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5967">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5968">Per IPv4, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5968">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5969">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv4_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5969">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5970">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5970">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5971">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5971">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5972">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5972">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5973">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5973">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5981">Numero di patente di guida in Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5981">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5983">Sei cifre seguite da quattro lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5983">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5984">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5985">Sei cifre e quattro lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5985">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5986">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5986">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5987">Quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5987">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5988">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5989">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5989">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5990">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5991">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5991">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5992">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5992">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-5993">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-5993">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6117">Numero di passaporto dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6117">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6118">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6119">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6119">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6120">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6121">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6121">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6122">Due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6122">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6123">Sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6123">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6124">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6125">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6125">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6126">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6127">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6127">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6128">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6128">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6129">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6129">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6130">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 BEA/MAGGIO 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave da `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6130">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6131">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6131">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6132">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6132">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6133">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6133">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6157">Numero del servizio pubblico personale (PPS) dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6157">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6158">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6159">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6159">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6160">sette cifre seguite da 1-2 lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6160">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6161">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6161">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6162">sette cifre seguite da due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6162">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6163">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6164">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6164">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6165">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6165">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6166">da una a due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6166">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6167">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6167">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6168">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6168">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6169">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6169">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6170">Lettera facoltativa nell'intervallo A-I o "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6170">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6171">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6171">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6172">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6172">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6173">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6173">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6174">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6174">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6175">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6175">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6176">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6176">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6177">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6178">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6178">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6179">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6179">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6180">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6180">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6225">Numero di conto corrente bancario Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6225">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6226">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6226">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6227">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6227">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6228">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6228">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6229">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6229">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6230">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6230">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6231">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6231">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6232">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6233">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6233">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6234">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6234">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6235">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6235">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6236">13 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6236">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6237">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6238">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6239">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6240">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6241">L'espressione regolare Regex_israel_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6241">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6242">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_israel_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6242">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6243">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6243">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6247">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6247">Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6249">Numero di identificazione nazionale Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6249">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6250">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6251">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6251">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6252">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6253">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6253">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6254">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6255">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6255">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6256">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6257">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6257">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6258">La funzione Func_israeli_national_id_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6258">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6259">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Israel_National_ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6259">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6260">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6260">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6279">Numero di patente di guida italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6279">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6280">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6280">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6282">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6282">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6283">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6284">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6284">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6285">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6285">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6286">la lettera "A" o "V" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6286">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6287">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6287">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6288">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6288">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6289">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6290">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6290">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6291">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6292">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6292">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6293">L'espressione `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6293">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6294">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6294">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6421">Codice fiscale italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6421">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6422">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6422">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6423">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6423">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6424">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6424">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6425">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6425">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6426">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6426">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6427">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6427">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6428">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6428">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6429">una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6429">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6430">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6430">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6431">Una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6431">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6432">tre lettere che corrispondono alle prime tre consonanti nel nome della famiglia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6432">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6433">tre lettere che corrispondono alla prima, alla terza e alla quarta consonanti nel nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6433">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6434">due cifre che corrispondono alle ultime cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6434">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6435">una lettera che corrisponde alla lettera del mese di nascita: le lettere vengono utilizzate in ordine alfabetico, ma vengono utilizzate solo le lettere da A a E, H, L, M, P, R a T (quindi, gennaio è A e ottobre è R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6435">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6436">due cifre che corrispondono al giorno del mese di nascita: per distinguere i sessi, vengono aggiunti 40 al giorno di nascita per le donne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6436">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6437">quattro cifre che corrispondono al codice di area specifico del comune in cui è nata la persona (i codici a livello nazionale vengono utilizzati per i paesi esterni)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6437">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6438">una cifra di parità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6438">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6439">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6440">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6440">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6441">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6442">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6442">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6443">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6443">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6444">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6444">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6445">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6446">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6446">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6481">Numero di passaporto italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6481">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6482">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6483">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6483">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6484">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6484">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6485">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6485">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6486">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6486">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6487">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6487">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6488">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6489">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6489">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6490">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6491">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6491">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6492">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6492">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6493">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6494">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6494">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6495">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6495">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6496">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6496">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6497">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6497">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6521">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6521">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6522">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6522">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6523">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6523">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6524">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6524">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6525">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6525">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6526">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6526">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6527">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6527">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6528">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6529">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6529">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6530">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6531">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6531">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6532">I o i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6532">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6533">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6533">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6534">spazio facoltativo, punto, trattino o virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6534">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6535">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6535">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6536">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6537">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6537">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6538">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6539">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6539">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6540">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6540">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6541">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6541">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6542">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6542">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6543">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6543">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6544">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6544">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6551">Numero di conto corrente bancario giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6551">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6553">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6553">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6554">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6555">numero di conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6555">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6556">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6556">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6557">codice filiale del conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6557">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6558">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6558">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6559">uno spazio o un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6559">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6560">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6560">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6562">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6563">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6564">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6564">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6565">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6565">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6566">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6566">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6567">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6567">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6568">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6568">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6569">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6569">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6570">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6570">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6571">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6571">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6572">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6572">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
