## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6619">Numero di patente di guida giapponese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6619">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6620">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6620">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6621">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6621">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6622">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6622">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6623">12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6623">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6624">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6625">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6626">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6627">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6627">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6628">La funzione Func_jp_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6628">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6629">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6629">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6682">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6683">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6684">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6684">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6685">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6685">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6686">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6686">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6687">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6687">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6719">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6722">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6722">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6736">Numero di passaporto giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6736">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6737">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6738">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6738">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6739">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6740">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6740">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6741">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6742">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6743">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6744">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6744">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6745">La funzione Func_jp_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6745">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6746">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6746">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6765">12 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6765">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6766">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6767">12 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6767">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6768">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6768">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6769">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6769">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6770">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6770">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6771">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6772">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6772">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6773">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6774">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6774">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6775">L'espressione regolare Regex_jp_residence_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6775">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6776">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_jp_residence_card_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6776">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">

      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6785">Numero di registrazione residente in Giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6785">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6786">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6786">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6787">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6787">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6788">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6788">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6789">11 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6789">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6790">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6791">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6791">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6792">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6793">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6793">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6794">La funzione Func_jp_resident_registration_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6794">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6795">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6795">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6808">Giappone - Numero di previdenza sociale (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6808">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6810">7-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6810">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6811">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6812">7-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6812">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6813">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6813">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6814">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6814">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6815">sei cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6815">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6816">7-12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6816">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6817">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6818">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6819">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6820">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6821">La funzione Func_jp_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6821">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6822">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6822">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6823">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6823">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6824">La funzione Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6824">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6825">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6825">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6846">Numero di patente lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6846">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6848">tre lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6848">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6849">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6850">tre lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6850">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6851">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6851">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6852">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6852">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6853">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6854">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6854">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6855">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6856">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6857">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6857">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6858">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6858">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6983">Codice personale Lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6983">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6984">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6985">11 cifre e un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6985">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6986">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6986">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6987">Formato precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6987">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6988">11 cifre e un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6988">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6989">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6989">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6990">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6990">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6991">una cifra che corrisponde al secolo di nascita ("0" per il 19° secolo, "1" per il 20° secolo e "2" per il 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6991">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6992">quattro cifre generate in modo casuale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6992">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6993">Nuovo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6993">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6994">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6994">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6995">Due cifre "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6995">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6996">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6996">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6997">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6997">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6998">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6998">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-6999">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-6999">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7000">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7000">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7001">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7001">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7002">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7002">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7003">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7004">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7004">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7067">Numero di passaporto lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7067">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7068">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7069">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7069">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7070">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7071">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7071">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7072">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7072">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7073">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7073">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7075">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7075">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7076">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7077">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7077">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7078">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7078">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7079">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7079">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7080">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7080">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7081">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7082">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7082">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7083">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7083">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7106">Numero di patente di guida lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7106">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7108">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7108">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7109">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7110">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7110">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7111">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7112">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7113">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7114">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7115">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7116">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7241">Codice personale Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7241">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7242">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7242">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7243">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7243">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7244">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7244">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7245">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7245">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7246">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7246">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7247">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7247">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7248">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7249">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7249">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7250">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7251">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7251">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7252">una cifra (da 1 a 6) che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita della persona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7252">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7253">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7253">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7254">tre cifre che corrispondono al numero seriale della data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7254">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7255">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7255">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7256">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7256">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7257">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7257">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7258">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7258">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7259">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7259">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7260">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7260">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7261">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7261">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7262">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7262">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7263">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7263">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7298">Numero di passaporto lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7298">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7299">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7300">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7300">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7301">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7302">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7302">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7303">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7304">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7304">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7305">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7306">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7306">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7307">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7307">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7308">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7308">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7309">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7309">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7310">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7311">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7311">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7312">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7312">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7332">Numero di patente di guida di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7332">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7333">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7334">sei cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7334">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7335">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7336">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7336">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7337">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7337">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7339">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7340">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7340">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7341">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7341">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7342">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7342">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7466">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Lussemburgo (persone fisiche)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7466">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7467">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7468">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7469">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7470">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7471">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7472">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7474">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7474">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7475">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7476">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7476">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7477">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7477">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7478">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7478">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7479">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7480">sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7480">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7481">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7482">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7482">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7483">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7483">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7484">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7484">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7485">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7485">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7486">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7486">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7509">Numero di passaporto di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7509">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7510">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7511">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7511">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7512">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7512">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7513">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7513">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7514">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7514">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7515">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7515">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7516">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7516">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7517">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7517">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7518">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7518">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7519">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7519">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7520">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7520">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7521">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7521">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7522">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7522">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7523">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7523">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7569">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7570">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7571">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7571">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7572">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7572">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7573">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7574">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7574">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7575">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7575">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7615">Numero di carta di identità malese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7615">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7616">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7617">12 cifre contenenti lineette facoltative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7617">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7618">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7619">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7619">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7620">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7620">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7621">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7622">Codice luogo di nascita a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7622">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7623">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7623">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7624">tre cifre casuali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7624">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7625">codice di genere a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7625">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7626">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7627">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7628">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7629">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7630">L'espressione regolare Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7630">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7631">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7631">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7658">Numero di patente di guida di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7658">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7659">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7660">Combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7660">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7661">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7662">combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7662">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7663">due caratteri (cifre o lettere, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7663">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7664">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7664">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7665">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7665">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7666">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7666">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7667">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7667">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7669">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7670">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7671">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7672">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7672">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7673">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7674">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7674">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7798">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7798">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7799">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7799">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7805">sette cifre seguite da una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7805">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7806">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7807">sette cifre seguite da una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7807">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7808">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7808">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7809">una lettera in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7809">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7810">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7811">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7811">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7812">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7813">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7813">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7814">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7814">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7815">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7815">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7816">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7816">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7817">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7817">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7834">Numero di passaporto di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7834">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7835">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7836">sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7836">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7837">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7837">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7838">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7838">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7839">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7840">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7840">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7841">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7842">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7843">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7843">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7844">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7844">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7845">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7845">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7846">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7847">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7848">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
