## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7868">Numero di identificazione fiscale di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7868">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7869">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7870">Per i cittadini maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7870">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7871">sette cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7871">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7872">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7872">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7873">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7873">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7874">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7875">Nazionali maltesi: sette cifre e una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7875">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7876">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7876">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7877">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7877">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7878">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7878">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7879">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7879">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7880">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7881">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7881">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7882">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7883">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7884">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7884">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7885">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7885">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7886">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7886">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7887">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7887">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7920">Numero BSN (Netherlands citizen's service)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7920">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7922">otto o nove cifre contenenti spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7922">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7923">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7924">otto-nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7924">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7925">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7925">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7926">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7926">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7927">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7927">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7928">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7928">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7929">due-tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7929">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7930">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7931">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7932">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7933">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7933">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7934">La funzione Func_netherlands_bsn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7934">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7935">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7935">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7936">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7960">Numero di patente olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7960">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7961">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7961">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7962">dieci cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7962">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7963">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7963">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7964">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7964">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7965">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7966">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7967">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7968">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7969">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7969">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-7970">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-7970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8098">Numero di passaporto olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8098">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8099">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8099">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8100">nove lettere o cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8100">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8101">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8101">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8102">nove lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8102">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8103">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8104">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8104">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8105">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8106">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8107">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8107">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8108">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8108">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8109">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8109">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8110">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8111">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8111">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8112">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8131">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8131">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8140">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8140">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8143">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8144">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8144">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8145">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8145">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8189">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8189">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8190">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8190">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8191">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8191">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8192">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8192">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8193">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8193">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8194">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8194">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8195">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8195">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8196">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8196">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8197">N o n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8197">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8198">L o l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8198">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8199">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8199">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8200">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8200">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8201">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8201">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8202">B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8202">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8203">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8203">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8204">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8205">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8206">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8207">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8208">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8208">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8209">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8209">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8210">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8210">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8211">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8211">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8270">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8273">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8373">Numero del ministero della sanità della Nuova Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8373">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8375">tre lettere, uno spazio (facoltativo) e quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8375">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8376">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8377">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) tranne "I" e "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8377">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8378">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8378">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8379">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8379">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8381">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8382">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8383">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8384">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8384">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8385">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8385">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8386">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8386">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8387">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8388">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8388">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8389">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8389">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8403">Numero di previdenza sociale neozelandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8403">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8404">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8404">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8405">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8405">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8406">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8406">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8407">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8407">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8408">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8408">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8409">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8409">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8410">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8410">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8412">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8413">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8413">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8414">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8414">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8415">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8415">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8416">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8416">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8417">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8417">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8418">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8418">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8419">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8420">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8421">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8422">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8423">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8423">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8424">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8424">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8425">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8425">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8426">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8426">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8434">Numero di identificazione norvegia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8434">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8436">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8436">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8437">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8438">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8438">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8439">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8439">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8440">numero individuale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8440">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8441">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8441">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8442">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8443">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8443">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8444">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8445">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8445">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8446">La funzione Func_norway_id_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8446">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8447">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8447">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8448">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8448">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8449">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8450">La funzione Func_norway_id_numbe trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8450">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8451">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8460">Numero di identificazione multivalore unificato delle Filippine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8460">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8463">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8464">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8464">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8465">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8465">four digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8467">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8467">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8468">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8468">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8469">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8469">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8470">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8471">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8472">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8473">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8474">L'espressione regolare Regex_philippines_unified_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8474">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8475">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_philippines_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8475">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8476">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8476">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8477">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8477">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8478">ID multifunzione unificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8478">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8479">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8479">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8480">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8480">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8481">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8482">Numero di patente di guida polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8482">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8484">14 cifre contenenti due barre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8484">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8485">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8486">14 cifre e due barre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8486">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8487">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8487">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8488">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8488">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8489">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8489">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8490">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8490">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8491">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8491">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8492">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8493">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8493">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8494">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8495">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8495">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8496">L'espressione  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8496">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8497">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8497">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8621">Carta di identità polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8621">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8622">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8623">tre lettere e sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8623">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8624">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8625">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8625">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8626">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8627">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8627">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8628">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8629">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8630">La funzione Func_polish_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8630">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8631">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8631">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8632">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8632">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8643">ID nazionale Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8643">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8645">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8645">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8646">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8646">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8647">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita nel formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8647">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8648">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8648">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8649">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8649">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8650">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8651">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8652">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8653">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8653">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8654">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8654">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8655">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8655">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8656">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8656">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8657">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8657">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8658">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8658">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8659">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8659">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8671">Numero di passaporto polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8671">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8672">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8672">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8673">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8673">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8675">due lettere e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8675">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8676">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8677">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8677">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8678">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8679">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8680">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8681">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8681">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8682">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8682">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8683">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8683">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8684">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8684">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8685">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8685">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8686">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8686">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8687">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8687">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8688">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8688">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8689">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8689">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8690">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8690">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8691">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8691">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8692">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8692">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8693">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8693">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8694">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8694">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8695">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8695">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8696">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8696">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8697">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8697">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8718">Numero REGON Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8718">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8719">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8719">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8720">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8720">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8721">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8721">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8722">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8722">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8723">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8723">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8724">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8724">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8725">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8726">Numero a 9 o 14 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8726">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8727">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8728">numero a nove cifre o a 14 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8728">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8729">nove cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8729">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8730">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8730">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8731">trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8731">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8732">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8732">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8733">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8734">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8735">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8736">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8737">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8737">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8738">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_polish_regon_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8738">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8739">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8739">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8740">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8740">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8758">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8758">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8759">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8759">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8760">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8760">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8762">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8762">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8763">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8763">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8765">11 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8765">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8766">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8767">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8767">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8768">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8769">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8769">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8770">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8771">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8772">La funzione  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8772">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8773">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8773">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8803">Numero di carta di cittadinanza portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8803">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8805">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8805">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8806">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8807">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8807">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8808">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8808">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8809">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8809">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8810">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8810">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8811">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8811">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8812">L'espressione regolare Regex_portugal_citizen_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8812">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8813">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8813">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8833">Numero di patente di guida portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8833">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8834">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8835">due modelli - due lettere seguite da 5-8 cifre con caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8835">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8836">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8837">Modello 1: due lettere seguite da 5/6 con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8837">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8838">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8838">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8839">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8839">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8840">Cinque o sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8840">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8841">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8841">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8842">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8842">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8843">Modello 2: una lettera seguita da 6/8 cifre con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8843">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8844">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8844">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8845">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8845">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8846">Sei o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8846">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8847">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8847">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8848">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8848">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8849">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8850">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8850">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8851">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8852">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8852">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8853">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8853">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8854">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8854">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8986">Numero di passaporto portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8986">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8987">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8987">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8988">una lettera seguita da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8988">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8989">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8989">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8990">una lettera seguita da sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8990">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8991">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8991">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8992">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8992">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8993">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8994">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8994">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8995">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8996">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8996">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8997">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8997">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8998">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8998">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-8999">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-8999">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9000">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9000">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9001">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9001">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9002">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9002">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
