## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9029">Numero di identificazione fiscale del Portogallo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9029">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9030">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9030">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9031">nove cifre con spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9031">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9032">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9032">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9033">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9033">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9034">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9034">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9035">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9035">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9036">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9036">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9037">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9037">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9038">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9038">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9039">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9039">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9040">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9040">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9041">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9041">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9042">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9042">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9043">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9043">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9044">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9044">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9045">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9045">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9046">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9046">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9070">Numero di patente di guida romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9070">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9071">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9072">un carattere seguito da otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9072">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9073">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9074">un carattere seguito da otto cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9074">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9075">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9075">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9076">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9076">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9077">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9077">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9078">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9078">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9079">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9079">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9080">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9080">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9081">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9081">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9082">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9082">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9210">Codice numerico personale Romania (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9210">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9211">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9212">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9213">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9214">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9215">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9216">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9218">13 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9218">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9219">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9219">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9220">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9220">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9221">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9221">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9222">due cifre, che possono essere 01-52 o 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9222">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9223">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9223">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9224">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9225">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9225">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9226">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9227">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9228">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9228">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9229">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9229">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9230">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9230">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9231">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9231">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9282">Numero di passaporto romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9282">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9284">otto o nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9284">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9285">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9286">otto o nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9286">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9287">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9288">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9288">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9289">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9290">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9290">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9291">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9291">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9292">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9292">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9293">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio- 01 FEB/FEB 10) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9293">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9294">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9295">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9295">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9296">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9296">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9396">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9396">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9397">L'espressione regolare Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9397">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9398">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9398">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9405">Numero NRIC (National Registration Identity Card) di Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9405">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9406">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9406">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9407">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9407">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9408">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9408">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9409">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9409">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9410">la lettera "F", "G", "S" o "T" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9410">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9411">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9411">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9412">una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9412">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9413">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9414">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9414">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9415">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9416">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9417">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9417">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9418">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9418">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9419">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9419">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9420">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9421">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9421">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9422">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9422">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9433">Numero di patente di guida slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9433">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9434">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9434">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9435">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9435">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9436">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9436">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9437">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9437">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9438">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9438">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9439">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9439">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9440">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9441">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9441">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9442">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9443">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9443">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9444">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9444">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9445">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9445">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9571">Numero personale Slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9571">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9572">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9573">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9574">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9575">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9576">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9577">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9578">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9579">nove o dieci cifre contenenti barra rovesciata facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9579">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9580">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9580">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9581">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9581">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9582">barra facoltativa (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9582">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9583">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9583">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9584">una cifra di controllo facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9584">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9585">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9586">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9586">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9587">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9588">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9588">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9589">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9589">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9590">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9590">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9591">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9591">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9592">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9592">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9639">Numero di passaporto slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9639">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9641">una cifra o una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9641">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9642">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9643">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9643">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9644">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9645">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9645">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9646">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9647">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9647">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9648">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9648">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9649">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9649">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9650">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9650">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9651">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9651">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9652">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9652">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9653">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9675">Numero di patente di guida slovena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9675">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9676">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9677">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9677">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9678">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9679">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9679">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9680">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9681">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9681">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9682">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9683">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9684">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9684">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9685">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9685">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9812">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9812">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9813">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9813">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9814">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9814">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9815">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9815">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9816">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9816">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9817">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9817">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9818">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9818">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9820">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9820">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9821">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9822">13 cifre nel modello specificato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9822">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9823">sette cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMLLL), dove "LLL" corrisponde alle ultime tre cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9823">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9824">due cifre che corrispondono all'area di nascita "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9824">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9825">tre cifre che corrispondono a una combinazione di sesso e numero di serie per le persone nate nello stesso giorno (000-499 per gli uomini e 500-999 per le donne)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9825">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9826">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9826">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9827">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9828">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9828">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9829">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9830">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9830">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9831">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9831">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9832">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9832">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9833">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9834">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9834">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9862">Numero di passaporto slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9862">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9863">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9864">due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9864">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9865">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9866">due lettere seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9866">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9867">la lettera "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9867">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9868">una lettera maiuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9868">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9869">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9869">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9870">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9871">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9871">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9872">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9873">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9873">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9874">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9874">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9875">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9875">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9876">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9876">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9877">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9878">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9878">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9879">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9879">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9902">Numero di identificazione fiscale Slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9902">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9903">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9904">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9905">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9906">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9907">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9908">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9910">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9910">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9911">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9912">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9912">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9913">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9913">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9914">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9914">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9915">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9916">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9916">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9917">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9918">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9918">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9919">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9919">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9920">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9920">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9921">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9922">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9922">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9946">Numero di identificazione sudafricano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9946">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9947">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9948">13 cifre che possono contenere spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9948">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9949">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9950">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9950">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9951">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9951">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9952">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9952">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9953">indicatore di cittadinanza a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9953">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9954">la cifra "8" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9954">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9955">una cifra, ovvero una cifra di checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9955">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9956">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9957">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9958">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9959">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9960">La funzione Func_south_africa_identification_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9960">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9961">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_south_africa_identification_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9961">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9962">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9962">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9963">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9963">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9964">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9964">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9965">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9965">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9966">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9966">ID</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9968">South Korea resident registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9968">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9970">13 cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9970">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9971">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9972">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9972">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9973">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9973">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9974">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9974">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9975">una cifra determinata dal secolo e dal sesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9975">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9976">Codice paese di nascita a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9976">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9977">una cifra utilizzata per distinguere le persone per le quali i numeri precedenti sono identici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9977">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9978">una cifra di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9978">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9979">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9980">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9980">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9981">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9982">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9982">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9983">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9983">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9984">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_south_korea_resident_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9984">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9985">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9985">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9986">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9987">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9987">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9988">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9988">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9989">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9989">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9990">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9990">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9991">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9991">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9992">Numero di registrazione del cittadino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9992">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9993">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9993">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9994">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9994">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9995">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9995">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9996">Numero di patente di guida in Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9996">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9997">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9998">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9998">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-9999">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-9999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10000">otto cifre seguite da un carattere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10000">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10001">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10001">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10002">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10002">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10003">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10003">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10004">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10004">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10005">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10005">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10006">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10006">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10007">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10007">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10008">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10008">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10009">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10009">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10010">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10010">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10144">Spagna DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10144">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10145">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10145">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10146">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10146">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10147">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10147">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10148">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10148">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10149">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10149">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10150">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10150">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10152">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10152">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10153">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10154">sette cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10154">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10155">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10155">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10156">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10156">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10157">una lettera di controllo (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10157">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10158">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10159">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10159">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10160">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10161">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10162">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10162">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10163">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10163">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10164">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10165">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10165">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10189">Numero di passaporto spagnolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10189">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10191">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10191">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10192">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10193">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10193">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10194">due cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10194">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10195">una cifra o una lettera (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10195">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10196">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10196">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10197">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10198">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10198">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10199">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10200">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10200">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10201">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10201">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10202">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10202">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10203">L'espressione `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG-MM-AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10203">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10204">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10204">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10205">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10205">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10206">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10206">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
