## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10235">Spagna - Numero di previdenza sociale (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10235">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10237">11-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10237">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10238">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10239">11-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10239">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10240">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10240">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10241">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10241">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10242">da sette a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10242">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10243">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10243">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10244">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10244">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10245">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10246">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10246">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10247">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10248">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10249">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10249">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10250">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10250">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10251">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10251">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10252">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10253">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10253">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10254">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10256">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10256">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10263">Numero di identificazione fiscale spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10263">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10264">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10264">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10265">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10265">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10266">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10266">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10267">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10267">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10268">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10268">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10269">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10269">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10270">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10271">sette o otto cifre e una o due lettere nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10271">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10272">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10273">Spagnolo Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10273">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10274">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10274">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10275">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10275">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10276">Spagnoli non residenti senza carta di identità nazionale di Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10276">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10277">una lettera maiuscola "L" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10277">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10278">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10278">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10279">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10279">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10280">Spagnoli residenti di età inferiore a 14 anni senza carta d'identità nazionale spagna:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10280">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10281">una lettera maiuscola "K" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10281">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10282">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10282">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10283">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10283">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10284">Stranieri con numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10284">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10285">una lettera maiuscola che è "X", "Y" o "Z" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10285">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10286">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10286">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10287">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10287">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10288">Stranieri senza numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10288">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10289">una lettera maiuscola che è "M" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10289">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10290">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10290">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10291">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10291">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10292">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10293">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10293">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10294">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10295">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10295">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10296">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10296">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10297">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10297">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10298">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10299">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10299">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10330">SQL Server stringa di connessione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10330">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10332">La stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10332">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10333">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10333">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10334">la stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10334">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10335">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10335">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10336">la stringa "Password" o "pwd" dove "pwd" non è preceduta da una lettera minuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10336">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10337">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10337">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10338">qualsiasi carattere che non sia un simbolo del dollaro ($), un simbolo di percentuale (%), un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un simbolo di simbolo (@), virgolette ("), un punto e virgola (;), una parentesi graffa sinistra([) o una parentesi quadra sinistra ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10338">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10339">qualsiasi combinazione di 7-128 caratteri che non siano un punto e virgola (;), barra (/) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10339">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10340">un punto e virgola (;) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10340">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10342">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10343">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10344">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10344">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10345">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10345">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10346">Una parola chiave CEP_GlobalFilter non viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10346">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10347">L'espressione CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10347">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10348">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10348">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10349">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10349">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10357">Password o pwd seguiti da 0-2 spazi, un segno di uguale (=), 0-2 spazi e un asterisco (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10357">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10358">Password o pwd seguito da:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10358">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10359">Segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10359">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10360">Simbolo minore di (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10360">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10362">Simbolo maggiore di (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10362">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10363">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10363">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10364">Tecnicamente, questo tipo di informazioni riservate identifica queste parole chiave utilizzando un'espressione regolare e non un elenco di parole chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10364">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10376">Numero di patente di guida in Svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10376">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10377">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10378">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10378">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10379">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10380">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10380">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10381">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10381">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10382">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10382">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10383">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10383">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10384">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10385">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10385">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10386">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10387">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10388">L'espressione  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10388">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10389">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10390">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10390">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10391">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10391">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10392">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10392">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10393">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10393">driverlics</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10522">Svezia - ID nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10522">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10524">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10524">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10525">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10525">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10526">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10526">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10527">due cifre (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10527">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10528">Sei cifre nel formato data AAMMGG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10528">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10529">delimitatore di "-" o "+" (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10529">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10530">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10530">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10531">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10531">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10532">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10532">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10533">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10533">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10534">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10534">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10535">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10535">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10536">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10536">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10537">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10537">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10538">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10538">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10539">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10539">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10540">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10540">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10559">Svezia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10559">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10560">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10561">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10561">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10562">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10563">otto cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10563">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10564">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10565">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10565">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10566">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10567">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10567">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10568">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10568">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10569">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10569">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10570">l'espressione regolare trova una data nel formato `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (01 JAN/JAN 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10570">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10571">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10571">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10572">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10572">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10573">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10573">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10609">Numero di identificazione fiscale svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10609">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10610">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10610">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10611">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10611">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10612">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10612">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10613">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10613">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10614">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10614">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10615">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10615">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10616">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10617">10 cifre e un simbolo nel motivo specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10617">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10618">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10619">10 cifre e un simbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10619">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10620">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10620">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10621">segno più o meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10621">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10622">tre cifre che rendono univoco il numero di identificazione dove:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10622">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10623">per i numeri emessi prima del 1990, la settima e l'ottava cifra identificano la provincia di nascita o i nati all'estero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10623">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10624">la cifra nella nona posizione indica il sesso per dispari per il maschio o anche per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10624">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10625">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10625">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10626">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10627">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10628">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10629">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10629">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10630">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10630">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10631">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10631">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10632">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10632">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10633">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10633">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10659">Codice SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10659">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10661">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10661">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10662">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10663">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10663">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10664">Codice bancario di quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10664">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10665">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10665">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10666">4-28 lettere o cifre (BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10666">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10667">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10667">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10668">da una a tre lettere o cifre (resto del BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10668">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10669">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10670">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10670">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10671">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10672">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10673">L'espressione regolare Regex_swift restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10673">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10674">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10674">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10714">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10714">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10717">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10717">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10718">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10719">Numero a 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10719">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10720">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10721">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10721">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10722">tre cifre - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10722">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10723">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10723">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10724">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10724">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10725">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10725">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10726">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10726">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10727">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10727">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10728">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10728">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10729">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10730">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10730">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10731">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10732">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10732">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10733">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10733">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10734">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10734">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10735">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10735">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10736">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10736">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10757">Taiwan - Numero di identificazione nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10757">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10758">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10758">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10759">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10759">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10760">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10760">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10761">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10761">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10762">una lettera (in inglese, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10762">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10763">la cifra "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10763">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10764">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10764">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10765">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10766">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10766">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10767">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10768">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10769">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10769">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10770">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10770">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10771">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10772">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10773">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10773">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10774">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10774">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10791">Numero di passaporto taiwanese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10791">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10792">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10793">Numero di passaporto biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10793">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10794">numero di passaporto non biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10794">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10795">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10795">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10796">numero di passaporto biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10796">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10797">il carattere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10797">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10798">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10798">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10799">numero di passaporto non biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10799">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10800">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10800">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10801">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10802">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10803">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10804">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10804">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10805">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_passport trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10805">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10806">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_taiwan_passport da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10806">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10817">Numero di certificato residente a Taiwan (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10817">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10818">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10819">10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10819">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10820">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10821">10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10821">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10822">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10822">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10823">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10823">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10824">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10825">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10825">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10826">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10827">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10828">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10828">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10829">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10829">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10843">Codice di identificazione della popolazione thai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10843">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10845">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10845">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10846">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10847">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10847">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10848">la prima cifra non è zero o nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10848">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10849">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10849">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10850">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10851">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10851">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10852">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10853">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10854">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10854">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10855">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10855">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10856">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10857">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10857">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10866">Numero di identificazione nazionale turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10866">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10867">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10867">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10868">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10868">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10869">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10869">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10870">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10870">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10871">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10872">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10872">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10873">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10874">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10874">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10875">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10875">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10876">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Turkish_National_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10876">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10877">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10877">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10878">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10878">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10885">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10885">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10886">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10886">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10887">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10887">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10888">Combinazione di 18 lettere e numeri nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10888">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10889">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10889">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10890">18 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10890">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10891">Cinque lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10891">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10892">Una cifra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10892">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10893">Cinque cifre nel formato di data MMDDY per la data di nascita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10893">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10894">Il settimo carattere viene incrementato di 50 se driver è femminile. per exampe, da 51 a 62 invece che da 01 a 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10894">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10895">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10895">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10896">Cinque cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10896">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10897">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10898">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10899">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10900">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10901">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10901">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10902">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10902">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10903">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10904">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10904">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10905">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10905">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-10906">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-10906">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11027">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11027">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11028">numero di rullino elettorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11028">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11029">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11030">due lettere seguite da 1-4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11030">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11031">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11032">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da 1-4 numeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11032">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11033">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11034">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11034">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11035">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11036">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11037">L'espressione regolare Regex_uk_electoral restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11037">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11038">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11038">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11039">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11039">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11040">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11040">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11041">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11041">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11042">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11042">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11043">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11043">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11044">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11044">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11045">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11045">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11046">numero del servizio sanitario nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11046">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11047">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11047">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11048">10-17 cifre separate da spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11048">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11049">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11049">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11050">10-17 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11050">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11051">3 o 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11051">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11052">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11052">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11053">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11053">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11054">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11054">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11055">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11055">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11056">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11057">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11057">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11058">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11059">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11059">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11060">La funzione Func_uk_nhs_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11060">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11061">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11061">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11062">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11062">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11063">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11063">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11064">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11064">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11065">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
