## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11083">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11083">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11084">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11084">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11085">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11085">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11086">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11086">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11087">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11088">sette o nove caratteri separati da spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11088">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11089">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11090">due modelli possibili:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11090">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11091">due lettere (i VALORI NINO validi utilizzano solo determinati caratteri in questo prefisso, convalidato da questo modello, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11091">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11092">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11092">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11093">'A', 'B', 'C' o 'D' (come il prefisso, nel suffisso sono consentiti solo determinati caratteri, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11093">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11094">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11094">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11095">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11095">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11096">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11096">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11097">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11097">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11098">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11098">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11099">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11099">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11100">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11100">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11101">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11101">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11102">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11102">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11103">"A", "B", "C" o "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11103">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11104">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11105">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11106">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11107">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11107">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11108">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11108">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11109">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11109">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11110">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11111">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11111">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11171">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11173">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11174">6-17 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11174">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11175">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11175">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11177">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11177">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11178">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11178">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11180">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11180">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11210">Numero di patente di guida statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11210">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11211">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11212">Varia in base allo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11212">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11213">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11214">dipende dallo stato, ad esempio New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11214">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11215">le nove cifre formattate come ddd ddd ddd corrisponderanno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11215">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11216">nove cifre come dddddddddd non corrispondono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11216">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11217">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11217">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11218">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11218">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11219">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11219">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11220">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11221">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11221">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11222">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11222">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11223">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11223">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11224">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11224">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11225">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11225">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11226">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11226">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11227">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11227">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11228">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11228">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11326">Numero di identificazione del singolo contribuente statunitense (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11326">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11328">nove cifre che iniziano con "9" e contengono "7" o "8" come quarta cifra, facoltativamente formattate con spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11328">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11329">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11330">formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11330">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11331">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11331">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11332">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11332">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11333">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11333">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11334">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11334">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11335">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11335">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11336">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11336">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11337">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11337">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11338">non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11338">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11339">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11339">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11340">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11340">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11341">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11341">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11342">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11342">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11343">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11344">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11344">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11345">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11346">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11347">La funzione Func_formatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11347">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11348">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11348">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11349">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11350">La funzione Func_unformatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11350">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11351">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11351">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11352">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11352">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11353">La funzione Func_formatted_itin o Func_unformatted_itin trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11353">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11354">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11354">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11355">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11355">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11358">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11358">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11359">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11359">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11360">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11360">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11361">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11361">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11368">Numero di previdenza sociale statunitense (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11368">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11370">nove cifre, che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11370">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11371">Se emesso prima della metà del 2011, un SSN ha una formattazione solida in cui alcune parti del numero devono rientrare in determinati intervalli per essere valide (ma non è presente alcun checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11371">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11372">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11373">Quattro funzioni ricercano i nomi SSN in quattro modelli diversi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11373">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11374">Func_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla 2011 formattata con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11374">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11375">Func_unformatted_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla versione 2011 non formattata come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11375">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11376">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trova sSN post-2011 formattati con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11376">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11377">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trova SSN post-2011 non formattati come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11377">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11378">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11379">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11379">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11380">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11381">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11381">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11382">La funzione Func_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11382">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11383">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11383">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11384">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11384">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11385">La funzione Func_unformatted_ssn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11385">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11386">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11386">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11387">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11387">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11388">La funzione Func_randomized_formatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11388">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11389">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11389">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11390">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11390">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11391">La funzione Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11391">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11392">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11392">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11407">Stati Uniti / Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11407">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11408">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11408">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11410">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11410">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11411">Modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11412">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11412">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11413">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11414">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11414">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11415">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11416">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11417">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11417">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11418">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11418">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11419">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11419">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11420">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11421">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11421">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="9edd1-11422">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="9edd1-11422">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
